verses.verse: In those <S%H3117>days<s%> was <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H2470>sick<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> 'Set your house in <S%H6680>order;<s%> for you shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> and not <S%H2421>live.<s%>'"
Then he <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H3068>now,<s%> Yahweh, I <S%H577>beg<s%> <S%H1980>you,<s%> how I have walked <S%H6440>before<s%> you in <S%H571>truth<s%> and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>" <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1419>bitterly.<s%>

It <S%H3470>happened,<s%> before Isaiah had gone <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H2691>part<s%> of the <S%H1697>city,<s%> that the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying,

"Turn <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> "I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8605>prayer.<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H1832>tears.<s%> <S%H7495>Behold,<s%> I will heal <S%H7992>you.<s%> On the third <S%H3117>day,<s%> you shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I will <S%H3254>add<s%> to your <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you and this <S%H5892>city<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%> I will <S%H1598>defend<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> for my own <S%H5650>sake,<s%> and for my servant <S%H1732>David<s%>'s sake."'"

<S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> a <S%H1690>cake<s%> of <S%H8384>figs.<s%>" They <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on the <S%H7822>boil,<s%> and he <S%H2421>recovered.<s%>

<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah,<s%> "What shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H5927>me,<s%> and that I shall go up to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%>"

<S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> to you from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that he has <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> shall the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> go <S%H1980>forward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps,<s%> or go <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps?<s%>"

<S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> "It is a light <S%H7043>thing<s%> for the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> to go <S%H5186>forward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%> <S%H6738>Nay,<s%> but let the shadow <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H322>backward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps.<s%>"

<S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> <S%H322>backward,<s%> <S%H4609>by<s%> which it had gone <S%H3381>down<s%> on the <S%H4609>dial<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> Berodach <S%H1081>Baladan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1081>Baladan,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> and a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah;<s%> for he had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> had been <S%H2470>sick.<s%>

<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H7200>them,<s%> and showed them all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his precious <S%H5238>things,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> and all that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H214>treasures:<s%> there was <S%H1697>nothing<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> nor in all his <S%H4475>dominion,<s%> that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7200>didn't<s%> show them.

Then <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H582>him,<s%> "What did these men <S%H559>say?<s%> From <S%H370>where<s%> did they <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2396>you?<s%>" Hezekiah <S%H559>said,<s%> "They have <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> even from <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "What have they <S%H7200>seen<s%> in your <S%H1004>house?<s%>" <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> "They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that is in my <S%H1004>house.<s%> There is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> among my <S%H214>treasures<s%> that I have not shown <S%H7200>them.<s%>"
<S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3117><s%> 'Behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> that all that is in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and that which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have laid up in <S%H686>store<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%> <S%H1697>Nothing<s%> shall be <S%H3498>left,<s%>' <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1121><s%> 'Of your sons who shall <S%H3318>issue<s%> from <S%H3205>you,<s%> whom you shall father, shall they take <S%H3947>away;<s%> and they shall be <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> in the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>'"

Then <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah,<s%> "The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> which you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7965>moreover,<s%> "Isn't it so, if peace and <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be in my <S%H3117>days?<s%>"

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> and all his <S%H1369>might,<s%> and how he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H1295>pool,<s%> and the <S%H8585>conduit,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>
<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
